summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SpencerSchotel.com ultra-minimalistic one-pager. Website loads correctly with all sections functional. Design follows Telegram-inspired guidelines with proper typography, color scheme, and responsive layout. Found minor issues with email copy functionality and scroll behavior.

ui_bugs.issue: Email copy to clipboard fails despite secure context and API availability
ui_bugs.symptoms: Shows 'Failed to copy email' toast notification when clicked

ui_bugs.issue: Scroll functionality works but doesn't reach exact blog section position
ui_bugs.symptoms: Scrolls 505px but blog section is at 975px from top

ui_bugs.issue: Button height (36px) below recommended 44px minimum touch target
ui_bugs.symptoms: May be difficult to tap on mobile devices

passed_tests: Hero section displays correctly with portrait, name, tagline, and CTA buttons
About section renders with bio paragraphs and YUPL.com link
Blog preview section shows 3 blog post cards with titles and dates
Blog cards have working hover effects (title changes to cyan color)
Contact section displays email and social icons correctly
All social links (X, Telegram, LinkedIn) are clickable and open in new tab
LinkedIn link points to correct URL: https://uk.linkedin.com/in/spencer-schotel
Responsive layout works on mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1920px)
Typography loads correctly (Space Grotesk for headings, Inter for body)
Color palette follows design guidelines (cyan accent #229ED9)
Interactive elements have proper focus states for keyboard navigation
All sections have proper spacing and whitespace
Hero CTA button mailto link works correctly (spencer@yupl.com)
YUPL.com link in hero section works with proper target
All data-testid attributes implemented for testing
Font Awesome icons load correctly for social links
All sections visible and properly laid out on different screen sizes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix email clipboard copy functionality in Contact.js - investigate why navigator.clipboard.writeText() is failing despite secure context. Improve scroll behavior for 'Read the blog' link to reach exact blog section position. Consider increasing CTA button height for better mobile accessibility.
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (18/19 major features working, 3 minor issues)
